Text.Page:
That beer was so tasty, I've come up with a new festival so everyone can enjoy it.

What do you say, ? want to be a part of history?"Actually, I already... Sure."

Oh, thank you!

This time out, I'll catch the Silver trout for the beer, but feeding the villagers is up to you.

There's a particularly tasty Big-Ass Fish here in Celsian Lake called the Queen Salmon.
I'm sure that would be enough to prepare the feast.
Please catch that fish for us.
<PCNAME> caught a Big-Ass Fish to help feed a village.

Woah, that's a Big-Ass Fish!
Thank you so much.
I'll spread the word.

Have you caught the Queen Salmon yet?
It can only be caught by fishing manually.

Thank you so much, .

The villagers all looking forward to a wonderful meal, but you can tast the results before anyone else!

And here's a little something extra from the Fishing Association.
